entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Halifax
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:54 PM ADT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Halifax Stanfield Int'l Airport 12:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: N 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming north 20 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 12 March 2023
